Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/bin/dnssec/dnssec-keyfromlabel.c

1/* $NetBSD: dnssec-keyfromlabel.c,v 1.4 2019/02/24 20:01:27 christos Exp $ */
2
3/*

5 *

7 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
8 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/.
9 *
10 * See the COPYRIGHT file distributed with this work for additional
11 * information regarding copyright ownership.
12 */
13
14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <ctype.h>
19#include <inttypes.h>
20#include <stdbool.h>
21#include <stdlib.h>
22
23#include <isc/buffer.h>
24#include <isc/commandline.h>
25#include <isc/mem.h>
26#include <isc/region.h>
27#include <isc/print.h>
28#include <isc/string.h>
29#include <isc/util.h>
30
31#include <pk11/site.h>
32
33#include <dns/dnssec.h>
34#include <dns/fixedname.h>
35#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
36#include <dns/log.h>
37#include <dns/name.h>
38#include <dns/rdataclass.h>
39#include <dns/result.h>
40#include <dns/secalg.h>
41
42#include <dst/dst.h>
43
44#if USE_PKCS11
45#include <pk11/result.h>
46#endif
47
48#include "dnssectool.h"
49
50#define MAX_RSA 4096 /* should be long enough... */
51
52const char *program = "dnssec-keyfromlabel";
53int verbose;
54
55ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE static void
56usage(void) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
57
58static void
59usage(void) {
60 fprintf(stderr, "Usage:\n");
61 fprintf(stderr, " %s -l label [options] name\n\n",
62 program);
63 fprintf(stderr, "Version: %s\n", VERSION);
64 fprintf(stderr, "Required options:\n");
65 fprintf(stderr, " -l label: label of the key pair\n");
66 fprintf(stderr, " name: owner of the key\n");
67 fprintf(stderr, "Other options:\n");
68 fprintf(stderr, " -a algorithm: \n"
69 " DH | RSASHA1 |\n"
70 " NSEC3RSASHA1 |\n"
71 " RSASHA256 | RSASHA512 |\n"
72 " ECDSAP256SHA256 | ECDSAP384SHA384\n");
73 fprintf(stderr, " -3: use NSEC3-capable algorithm\n");
74 fprintf(stderr, " -c class (default: IN)\n");
75 fprintf(stderr, " -E <engine>:\n");
76#if USE_PKCS11
77 fprintf(stderr, " path to PKCS#11 provider library "
78 "(default is %s)\n", PK11_LIB_LOCATION);
79#else
80 fprintf(stderr, " name of an OpenSSL engine to use\n");
81#endif
82 fprintf(stderr, " -f keyflag: KSK | REVOKE\n");
83 fprintf(stderr, " -K directory: directory in which to place "
84 "key files\n");
85 fprintf(stderr, " -k: generate a TYPE=KEY key\n");
86 fprintf(stderr, " -L ttl: default key TTL\n");
87 fprintf(stderr, " -n nametype: ZONE | HOST | ENTITY | USER | OTHER\n");
88 fprintf(stderr, " (DNSKEY generation defaults to ZONE\n");
89 fprintf(stderr, " -p protocol: default: 3 [dnssec]\n");
90 fprintf(stderr, " -t type: "
91 "AUTHCONF | NOAUTHCONF | NOAUTH | NOCONF "
92 "(default: AUTHCONF)\n");
93 fprintf(stderr, " -y: permit keys that might collide\n");
94 fprintf(stderr, " -v verbose level\n");
95 fprintf(stderr, " -V: print version information\n");
96 fprintf(stderr, "Date options:\n");
97 fprintf(stderr, " -P date/[+-]offset: set key publication date\n");
98 fprintf(stderr, " -P sync date/[+-]offset: set CDS and CDNSKEY "
99 "publication date\n");
100 fprintf(stderr, " -A date/[+-]offset: set key activation date\n");
101 fprintf(stderr, " -R date/[+-]offset: set key revocation date\n");
102 fprintf(stderr, " -I date/[+-]offset: set key inactivation date\n");
103 fprintf(stderr, " -D date/[+-]offset: set key deletion date\n");
104 fprintf(stderr, " -D sync date/[+-]offset: set CDS and CDNSKEY "
105 "deletion date\n");
106 fprintf(stderr, " -G: generate key only; do not set -P or -A\n");
107 fprintf(stderr, " -C: generate a backward-compatible key, omitting"
108 " all dates\n");
109 fprintf(stderr, " -S <key>: generate a successor to an existing "
110 "key\n");
111 fprintf(stderr, " -i <interval>: prepublication interval for "
112 "successor key "
113 "(default: 30 days)\n");
114 fprintf(stderr, "Output:\n");
115 fprintf(stderr, " K<name>+<alg>+<id>.key, "
116 "K<name>+<alg>+<id>.private\n");
117
118 exit (-1);
119}
120
121int
122main(int argc, char **argv) {
123 char *algname = NULL, *freeit = NULL;
124 char *nametype = NULL, *type = NULL;
125 const char *directory = NULL;
126 const char *predecessor = NULL;
127 dst_key_t *prevkey = NULL;
128 const char *engine = NULL;
129 char *classname = NULL;
130 char *endp;
131 dst_key_t *key = NULL;
132 dns_fixedname_t fname;
133 dns_name_t *name;
134 uint16_t flags = 0, kskflag = 0, revflag = 0;
135 dns_secalg_t alg;
136 bool oldstyle = false;
137 isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
138 int ch;
139 int protocol = -1, signatory = 0;
140 isc_result_t ret;
141 isc_textregion_t r;
142 char filename[255];
143 isc_buffer_t buf;
144 isc_log_t *log = NULL;
145 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass;
146 int options = DST_TYPE_PRIVATE | DST_TYPE_PUBLIC;
147 char *label = NULL;
148 dns_ttl_t ttl = 0;
149 isc_stdtime_t publish = 0, activate = 0, revoke = 0;
150 isc_stdtime_t inactive = 0, deltime = 0;
151 isc_stdtime_t now;
152 int prepub = -1;
153 bool setpub = false, setact = false;
154 bool setrev = false, setinact = false;
155 bool setdel = false, setttl = false;
156 bool unsetpub = false, unsetact = false;
157 bool unsetrev = false, unsetinact = false;
158 bool unsetdel = false;
159 bool genonly = false;
160 bool use_nsec3 = false;
161 bool avoid_collisions = true;
162 bool exact;
163 unsigned char c;
164 isc_stdtime_t syncadd = 0, syncdel = 0;
165 bool unsetsyncadd = false, setsyncadd = false;
166 bool unsetsyncdel = false, setsyncdel = false;
167
168 if (argc == 1)
169 usage();
170
171 RUNTIME_CHECK(isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx) == ISC_R_SUCCESS);
172
173#if USE_PKCS11
174 pk11_result_register();
175#endif
176 dns_result_register();
177
178 isc_commandline_errprint = false;
179
180 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
181
182#define CMDLINE_FLAGS "3A:a:Cc:D:E:Ff:GhI:i:kK:L:l:n:P:p:R:S:t:v:Vy"
183 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv, CMDLINE_FLAGS)) != -1) {
184 switch (ch) {
185 case '3':
186 use_nsec3 = true;
187 break;
188 case 'a':
189 algname = isc_commandline_argument;
190 break;
191 case 'C':
192 oldstyle = true;
193 break;
194 case 'c':
195 classname = isc_commandline_argument;
196 break;
197 case 'E':
198 engine = isc_commandline_argument;
199 break;
200 case 'f':
201 c = (unsigned char)(isc_commandline_argument[0]);
202 if (toupper(c) == 'K')
203 kskflag = DNS_KEYFLAG_KSK;
204 else if (toupper(c) == 'R')
205 revflag = DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE;
206 else
207 fatal("unknown flag '%s'",
208 isc_commandline_argument);
209 break;
210 case 'K':
211 directory = isc_commandline_argument;
212 ret = try_dir(directory);
213 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
214 fatal("cannot open directory %s: %s",
215 directory, isc_result_totext(ret));
216 break;
217 case 'k':
218 options |= DST_TYPE_KEY;
219 break;
220 case 'L':
221 ttl = strtottl(isc_commandline_argument);
222 setttl = true;
223 break;
224 case 'l':
225 label = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, isc_commandline_argument);
226 break;
227 case 'n':
228 nametype = isc_commandline_argument;
229 break;
230 case 'p':
231 protocol = strtol(isc_commandline_argument, &endp, 10);
232 if (*endp != '\0' || protocol < 0 || protocol > 255)
233 fatal("-p must be followed by a number "
234 "[0..255]");
235 break;
236 case 't':
237 type = isc_commandline_argument;
238 break;
239 case 'v':
240 verbose = strtol(isc_commandline_argument, &endp, 0);
241 if (*endp != '\0')
242 fatal("-v must be followed by a number");
243 break;
244 case 'y':
245 avoid_collisions = false;
246 break;
247 case 'G':
248 genonly = true;
249 break;
250 case 'P':
251 /* -Psync ? */
252 if (isoptarg("sync", argv, usage)) {
253 if (unsetsyncadd || setsyncadd)
254 fatal("-P sync specified more than "
255 "once");
256
257 syncadd = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
258 now, now, &setsyncadd);
259 unsetsyncadd = !setsyncadd;
260 break;
261 }
262 /* -Pdnskey ? */
263 (void)isoptarg("dnskey", argv, usage);
264 if (setpub || unsetpub)
265 fatal("-P specified more than once");
266
267 publish = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
268 now, now, &setpub);
269 unsetpub = !setpub;
270 break;
271 case 'A':
272 if (setact || unsetact)
273 fatal("-A specified more than once");
274
275 activate = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
276 now, now, &setact);
277 unsetact = !setact;
278 break;
279 case 'R':
280 if (setrev || unsetrev)
281 fatal("-R specified more than once");
282
283 revoke = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
284 now, now, &setrev);
285 unsetrev = !setrev;
286 break;
287 case 'I':
288 if (setinact || unsetinact)
289 fatal("-I specified more than once");
290
291 inactive = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
292 now, now, &setinact);
293 unsetinact = !setinact;
294 break;
295 case 'D':
296 /* -Dsync ? */
297 if (isoptarg("sync", argv, usage)) {
298 if (unsetsyncdel || setsyncdel)
299 fatal("-D sync specified more than "
300 "once");
301
302 syncdel = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
303 now, now, &setsyncdel);
304 unsetsyncdel = !setsyncdel;
305 break;
306 }
307 /* -Ddnskey ? */
308 (void)isoptarg("dnskey", argv, usage);
309 if (setdel || unsetdel)
310 fatal("-D specified more than once");
311
312 deltime = strtotime(isc_commandline_argument,
313 now, now, &setdel);
314 unsetdel = !setdel;
315 break;
316 case 'S':
317 predecessor = isc_commandline_argument;
318 break;
319 case 'i':
320 prepub = strtottl(isc_commandline_argument);
321 break;
322 case 'F':
323 /* Reserved for FIPS mode */
324 /* FALLTHROUGH */
325 case '?':
326 if (isc_commandline_option != '?')
327 fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid argument -%c\n",
328 program, isc_commandline_option);
329 /* FALLTHROUGH */
330 case 'h':
331 /* Does not return. */
332 usage();
333
334 case 'V':
335 /* Does not return. */
336 version(program);
337
338 default:
339 fprintf(stderr, "%s: unhandled option -%c\n",
340 program, isc_commandline_option);
341 exit(1);
342 }
343 }
344
345 ret = dst_lib_init(mctx, engine);
346 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
347 fatal("could not initialize dst: %s",
348 isc_result_totext(ret));
349
350 setup_logging(mctx, &log);
351
352 if (predecessor == NULL) {
353 if (label == NULL)
354 fatal("the key label was not specified");
355 if (argc < isc_commandline_index + 1)
356 fatal("the key name was not specified");
357 if (argc > isc_commandline_index + 1)
358 fatal("extraneous arguments");
359
360 name = dns_fixedname_initname(&fname);
361 isc_buffer_init(&buf, argv[isc_commandline_index],
362 strlen(argv[isc_commandline_index]));
363 isc_buffer_add(&buf, strlen(argv[isc_commandline_index]));
364 ret = dns_name_fromtext(name, &buf, dns_rootname, 0, NULL);
365 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
366 fatal("invalid key name %s: %s",
367 argv[isc_commandline_index],
368 isc_result_totext(ret));
369
370 if (strchr(label, ':') == NULL) {
371 char *l;
372 int len;
373
374 len = strlen(label) + 8;
375 l = isc_mem_allocate(mctx, len);
376 if (l == NULL)
377 fatal("cannot allocate memory");
378 snprintf(l, len, "pkcs11:%s", label);
379 isc_mem_free(mctx, label);
380 label = l;
381 }
382
383 if (algname == NULL) {
384 fatal("no algorithm specified");
385 }
386
387 r.base = algname;
388 r.length = strlen(algname);
389 ret = dns_secalg_fromtext(&alg, &r);
390 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
391 fatal("unknown algorithm %s", algname);
392 }
393 if (alg == DST_ALG_DH) {
394 options |= DST_TYPE_KEY;
395 }
396
397 if (use_nsec3) {
398 switch (alg) {
399 case DST_ALG_RSASHA1:
400 alg = DST_ALG_NSEC3RSASHA1;
401 break;
402 case DST_ALG_NSEC3RSASHA1:
403 case DST_ALG_RSASHA256:
404 case DST_ALG_RSASHA512:
405 case DST_ALG_ECDSA256:
406 case DST_ALG_ECDSA384:
407 case DST_ALG_ED25519:
408 case DST_ALG_ED448:
409 break;
410 default:
411 fatal("%s is incompatible with NSEC3; "
412 "do not use the -3 option", algname);
413 }
414 }
415
416 if (type != NULL && (options & DST_TYPE_KEY) != 0) {
417 if (strcasecmp(type, "NOAUTH") == 0)
418 flags |= DNS_KEYTYPE_NOAUTH;
419 else if (strcasecmp(type, "NOCONF") == 0)
420 flags |= DNS_KEYTYPE_NOCONF;
421 else if (strcasecmp(type, "NOAUTHCONF") == 0)
422 flags |= (DNS_KEYTYPE_NOAUTH |
423 DNS_KEYTYPE_NOCONF);
424 else if (strcasecmp(type, "AUTHCONF") == 0)
425 /* nothing */;
426 else
427 fatal("invalid type %s", type);
428 }
429
430 if (!oldstyle && prepub > 0) {
431 if (setpub && setact && (activate - prepub) < publish)
432 fatal("Activation and publication dates "
433 "are closer together than the\n\t"
434 "prepublication interval.");
435
436 if (!setpub && !setact) {
437 setpub = setact = true;
438 publish = now;
439 activate = now + prepub;
440 } else if (setpub && !setact) {
441 setact = true;
442 activate = publish + prepub;
443 } else if (setact && !setpub) {
444 setpub = true;
445 publish = activate - prepub;
446 }
447
448 if ((activate - prepub) < now)
449 fatal("Time until activation is shorter "
450 "than the\n\tprepublication interval.");
451 }
452 } else {
453 char keystr[DST_KEY_FORMATSIZE];
454 isc_stdtime_t when;
455 int major, minor;
456
457 if (prepub == -1)
458 prepub = (30 * 86400);
459
460 if (algname != NULL)
461 fatal("-S and -a cannot be used together");
462 if (nametype != NULL)
463 fatal("-S and -n cannot be used together");
464 if (type != NULL)
465 fatal("-S and -t cannot be used together");
466 if (setpub || unsetpub)
467 fatal("-S and -P cannot be used together");
468 if (setact || unsetact)
469 fatal("-S and -A cannot be used together");
470 if (use_nsec3)
471 fatal("-S and -3 cannot be used together");
472 if (oldstyle)
473 fatal("-S and -C cannot be used together");
474 if (genonly)
475 fatal("-S and -G cannot be used together");
476
477 ret = dst_key_fromnamedfile(predecessor, directory,
478 DST_TYPE_PUBLIC | DST_TYPE_PRIVATE,
479 mctx, &prevkey);
480 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
481 fatal("Invalid keyfile %s: %s",
482 predecessor, isc_result_totext(ret));
483 if (!dst_key_isprivate(prevkey))
484 fatal("%s is not a private key", predecessor);
485
486 name = dst_key_name(prevkey);
487 alg = dst_key_alg(prevkey);
488 flags = dst_key_flags(prevkey);
489
490 dst_key_format(prevkey, keystr, sizeof(keystr));
491 dst_key_getprivateformat(prevkey, &major, &minor);
492 if (major != DST_MAJOR_VERSION || minor < DST_MINOR_VERSION)
493 fatal("Key %s has incompatible format version %d.%d\n\t"
494 "It is not possible to generate a successor key.",
495 keystr, major, minor);
496
497 ret = dst_key_gettime(prevkey, DST_TIME_ACTIVATE, &when);
498 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
499 fatal("Key %s has no activation date.\n\t"
500 "You must use dnssec-settime -A to set one "
501 "before generating a successor.", keystr);
502
503 ret = dst_key_gettime(prevkey, DST_TIME_INACTIVE, &activate);
504 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
505 fatal("Key %s has no inactivation date.\n\t"
506 "You must use dnssec-settime -I to set one "
507 "before generating a successor.", keystr);
508
509 publish = activate - prepub;
510 if (publish < now)
511 fatal("Key %s becomes inactive\n\t"
512 "sooner than the prepublication period "
513 "for the new key ends.\n\t"
514 "Either change the inactivation date with "
515 "dnssec-settime -I,\n\t"
516 "or use the -i option to set a shorter "
517 "prepublication interval.", keystr);
518
519 ret = dst_key_gettime(prevkey, DST_TIME_DELETE, &when);
520 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
521 fprintf(stderr, "%s: WARNING: Key %s has no removal "
522 "date;\n\t it will remain in the zone "
523 "indefinitely after rollover.\n\t "
524 "You can use dnssec-settime -D to "
525 "change this.\n", program, keystr);
526
527 setpub = setact = true;
528 }
529
530 if (nametype == NULL) {
531 if ((options & DST_TYPE_KEY) != 0) /* KEY */
532 fatal("no nametype specified");
533 flags |= DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE; /* DNSKEY */
534 } else if (strcasecmp(nametype, "zone") == 0)
535 flags |= DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE;
536 else if ((options & DST_TYPE_KEY) != 0) { /* KEY */
537 if (strcasecmp(nametype, "host") == 0 ||
538 strcasecmp(nametype, "entity") == 0)
539 flags |= DNS_KEYOWNER_ENTITY;
540 else if (strcasecmp(nametype, "user") == 0)
541 flags |= DNS_KEYOWNER_USER;
542 else
543 fatal("invalid KEY nametype %s", nametype);
544 } else if (strcasecmp(nametype, "other") != 0) /* DNSKEY */
545 fatal("invalid DNSKEY nametype %s", nametype);
546
547 rdclass = strtoclass(classname);
548
549 if (directory == NULL)
550 directory = ".";
551
552 if ((options & DST_TYPE_KEY) != 0) /* KEY */
553 flags |= signatory;
554 else if ((flags & DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE) != 0) { /* DNSKEY */
555 flags |= kskflag;
556 flags |= revflag;
557 }
558
559 if (protocol == -1)
560 protocol = DNS_KEYPROTO_DNSSEC;
561 else if ((options & DST_TYPE_KEY) == 0 &&
562 protocol != DNS_KEYPROTO_DNSSEC)
563 fatal("invalid DNSKEY protocol: %d", protocol);
564
565 if ((flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_TYPEMASK) == DNS_KEYTYPE_NOKEY) {
566 if ((flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_SIGNATORYMASK) != 0)
567 fatal("specified null key with signing authority");
568 }
569
570 if ((flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_OWNERMASK) == DNS_KEYOWNER_ZONE &&
571 alg == DNS_KEYALG_DH)
572 fatal("a key with algorithm '%s' cannot be a zone key",
573 algname);
574
575 isc_buffer_init(&buf, filename, sizeof(filename) - 1);
576
577 /* associate the key */
578 ret = dst_key_fromlabel(name, alg, flags, protocol, rdclass,
579#if USE_PKCS11
580 "pkcs11",
581#else
582 engine,
583#endif
584 label, NULL, mctx, &key);
585
586 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
587 char namestr[DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE];
588 char algstr[DNS_SECALG_FORMATSIZE];
589 dns_name_format(name, namestr, sizeof(namestr));
590 dns_secalg_format(alg, algstr, sizeof(algstr));
591 fatal("failed to get key %s/%s: %s",
592 namestr, algstr, isc_result_totext(ret));
593 /* NOTREACHED */
594 exit(-1);
595 }
596
597 /*
598 * Set key timing metadata (unless using -C)
599 *
600 * Publish and activation dates are set to "now" by default, but
601 * can be overridden. Creation date is always set to "now".
602 */
603 if (!oldstyle) {
604 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_CREATED, now);
605
606 if (genonly && (setpub || setact))
607 fatal("cannot use -G together with -P or -A options");
608
609 if (setpub)
610 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_PUBLISH, publish);
611 else if (setact)
612 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_PUBLISH, activate);
613 else if (!genonly && !unsetpub)
614 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_PUBLISH, now);
615
616 if (setact)
617 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_ACTIVATE, activate);
618 else if (!genonly && !unsetact)
619 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_ACTIVATE, now);
620
621 if (setrev) {
622 if (kskflag == 0)
623 fprintf(stderr, "%s: warning: Key is "
624 "not flagged as a KSK, but -R "
625 "was used. Revoking a ZSK is "
626 "legal, but undefined.\n",
627 program);
628 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_REVOKE, revoke);
629 }
630
631 if (setinact)
632 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_INACTIVE, inactive);
633
634 if (setdel)
635 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_DELETE, deltime);
636 if (setsyncadd)
637 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_SYNCPUBLISH, syncadd);
638 if (setsyncdel)
639 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_SYNCDELETE, syncdel);
640
641 } else {
642 if (setpub || setact || setrev || setinact ||
643 setdel || unsetpub || unsetact ||
644 unsetrev || unsetinact || unsetdel || genonly ||
645 setsyncadd || setsyncdel)
646 fatal("cannot use -C together with "
647 "-P, -A, -R, -I, -D, or -G options");
648 /*
649 * Compatibility mode: Private-key-format
650 * should be set to 1.2.
651 */
652 dst_key_setprivateformat(key, 1, 2);
653 }
654
655 /* Set default key TTL */
656 if (setttl)
657 dst_key_setttl(key, ttl);
658
659 /*
660 * Do not overwrite an existing key. Warn LOUDLY if there
661 * is a risk of ID collision due to this key or another key
662 * being revoked.
663 */
664 if (key_collision(key, name, directory, mctx, &exact)) {
665 isc_buffer_clear(&buf);
666 ret = dst_key_buildfilename(key, 0, directory, &buf);
667 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
668 fatal("dst_key_buildfilename returned: %s\n",
669 isc_result_totext(ret));
670 if (exact)
671 fatal("%s: %s already exists\n", program, filename);
672
673 if (avoid_collisions)
674 fatal("%s: %s could collide with another key upon "
675 "revokation\n", program, filename);
676
677 fprintf(stderr, "%s: WARNING: Key %s could collide with "
678 "another key upon revokation. If you plan "
679 "to revoke keys, destroy this key and "
680 "generate a different one.\n",
681 program, filename);
682 }
683
684 ret = dst_key_tofile(key, options, directory);
685 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
686 char keystr[DST_KEY_FORMATSIZE];
687 dst_key_format(key, keystr, sizeof(keystr));
688 fatal("failed to write key %s: %s\n", keystr,
689 isc_result_totext(ret));
690 }
691
692 isc_buffer_clear(&buf);
693 ret = dst_key_buildfilename(key, 0, NULL, &buf);
694 if (ret != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
695 fatal("dst_key_buildfilename returned: %s\n",
696 isc_result_totext(ret));
697 printf("%s\n", filename);
698 dst_key_free(&key);
699 if (prevkey != NULL)
700 dst_key_free(&prevkey);
701
702 cleanup_logging(&log);
703 dst_lib_destroy();
704 dns_name_destroy();
705 if (verbose > 10)
706 isc_mem_stats(mctx, stdout);
707 isc_mem_free(mctx, label);
708 isc_mem_destroy(&mctx);
709
710 if (freeit != NULL)
711 free(freeit);
712
713 return (0);
714}
715
